bibl.author: Charles Eldridge
bibl.title: Charles Eldridge to Walt Whitman, 2 May 1876
bibl.orgName: The Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839–1919, Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.

revisionDesc.change: made basic checking changes to file

body.p: Enclosed I send you a copy of a letter received by William. He says he knew the writer by correspondence only, when he was on the Saturday Eve'gEvening Post. Her name was then Fanny Malone Raymond, and she was said to be extremely beautiful and probably is so yet,

You had better accept their invitation—How did you
like Williams William's article? And how is your health. write to me if you can—All your friends well here as far as I know.
